text: Problematic with Moshe Kasher is an American late-night talk show hosted by Moshe Kasher. The series premiered on April 18, 2017, on Comedy Central. It was cancelled on June 6, 2017. ==Episodes== ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2010s American late-night television series Category:2017 American television series debuts Category:English-language television shows Category:Comedy Central original programming
title: Problematic with Moshe Kasher
